mapper.insert: insert into module_branch (module_branch_id, module_id, `partition`, second_requirement_id) values (#{moduleBranchId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{secondRequirementId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select module_branch_id, module_id, `partition`, second_requirement_id from module_branch
